name: 山海长歌
description:
Shanhaichangge is a war strategy tower defense game based on the battle of the deer. The Chiyou army is about to attack your city, you need to continuously improve the army lineup, use the recruitment order reasonably, and help the Yellow Emperor defeat Chiyou.
Game Features:
1. Character lineup
2. Five elements attribute selection
3. The first perspective tower defense war
